body: Can you explain in code comments what you mean by "scales"? Typically, people treat int/float as the scale (e.g. 127/6 for RELU6). Your definition seems different.
body_html: Can you explain in code comments what you mean by "scales"? Typically, people treat int/float as the scale (e.g. 127/6 for RELU6). Your definition seems different.
body_text: Can you explain in code comments what you mean by "scales"? Typically, people treat int/float as the scale (e.g. 127/6 for RELU6). Your definition seems different.
